LanguageData.AS_WHEAT_Penetrator.label: Penetrator
LanguageData.AS_WHEAT_Penetrator.description: A sniper rifle modified from the AS sniper rifle by applying ancient technology analyzed by half-elves. While specialized for longer distances, it's longer and heavier, making it harder to handle, but the physical strength of a half-elf shouldn't be a problem.
LanguageData.AS_WHEAT_Penetrator.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.AS_WHEAT_Penetrator.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.AS_WHEAT_Grawes.label: Grawes
LanguageData.AS_WHEAT_Grawes.description: A shotgun modified from Gravere, applying ancient technology analyzed by half-elves.
LanguageData.AS_WHEAT_Grawes.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.AS_WHEAT_Grawes.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.AS_WHEAT_Bullet_Sniper_Rifle.label: Half-elf large high-velocity armor-piercing high-explosive shell
LanguageData.AS_WHEAT_Bullet_Shotgun_Backshot.label: Half-elf high-power buckshot bullet
